   17: -module(syntax_tools_SUITE).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: %% Test server specific exports
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: %% Test cases
   26: -export([app_test/1,appup_test/1,smoke_test/1,revert/1,revert_map/1,
   27:          revert_map_type/1,revert_preserve_pos_changes/1,
   28:          wrapped_subtrees/1,
   29:          t_abstract_type/1,t_erl_parse_type/1,t_type/1,
   30:          t_epp_dodger/1,t_epp_dodger_clever/1,
   31:          t_comment_scan/1,t_prettypr/1,test_named_fun_bind_ann/1,
   32:          test_maybe_expr_ann/1]).
   33: 
   34: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [app_test,appup_test,smoke_test,revert,revert_map,revert_map_type,
   38:      revert_preserve_pos_changes,
   39:      wrapped_subtrees,
   40:      t_abstract_type,t_erl_parse_type,t_type,
   41:      t_epp_dodger,t_epp_dodger_clever,
   42:      t_comment_scan,t_prettypr,test_named_fun_bind_ann,
   43:      test_maybe_expr_ann].
   44: 
   45: groups() ->
   46:     [].
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   52:     ok.
   53: 
   54: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   61:     ok = test_server:app_test(syntax_tools).
   62: 
   63: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   64:     ok = test_server:appup_test(syntax_tools).
   65: 
   66: %% Read and parse all source in the OTP release.
   67: smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   68:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
   69:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(),"*","src","*.erl"]),
   70:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
   71:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
   72:     case p_run(fun smoke_test_file/1, Fs) of
   73:         0 -> ok;
   74:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
   75:     end,
   76:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
   77: 
   78: smoke_test_file(File) ->
   79:     case epp_dodger:parse_file(File) of
   80: 	{ok,Forms} ->
   81: 	    [print_error_markers(F, File) || F <- Forms],
   82: 	    ok;
   83: 	{error,Reason} ->
   84: 	    io:format("~ts: ~p\n", [File,Reason]),
   85: 	    error
   86:     end.
   87: 
   88: print_error_markers(F, File) ->
   89:     case erl_syntax:type(F) of
   90: 	error_marker ->
   91: 	    {L,M,Info} = erl_syntax:error_marker_info(F),
   92: 	    io:format("~ts:~p: ~ts", [File,L,M:format_error(Info)]);
   93: 	_ ->
   94: 	    ok
   95:     end.
   96: 
   97: 
   98: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap and revert with erl_syntax and check for equality.
   99: revert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
  101:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir("stdlib"),"src","*.erl"]),
  102:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  103:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  104:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  105:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  106:     case p_run(fun (File) -> revert_file(File, Path) end, Fs) of
  107:         0 -> ok;
  108:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  109:         end,
  110:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  111: 
  112: revert_file(File, Path) ->
  113:     case epp:parse_file(File, [{includes,Path},
  114:                                res_word_option()]) of
  115:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  116:             Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  117:             Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun (Node) -> Node end, Fs1),
  118:             Fs3 = erl_syntax:form_list_elements(Fs2),
  119:             Fs4 = [ erl_syntax:revert(Form) || Form <- Fs3 ],
  120:             case compile:forms(Fs4, [report,return,strong_validation]) of
  121:                 {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  122:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {moduledoc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  123:                     ok;
  124:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {doc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  125:                     ok
  126:             end
  127:     end.
  128: 
  129: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc
  130: revert_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  132:     [{map_field_assoc,16,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}] =
  133:     erl_syntax:revert_forms([{tree,map_field_assoc,
  134:                              {attr,16,[],none},
  135: 			     {map_field_assoc,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}}]),
  136:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  137: 
  138: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc in types
  139: revert_map_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  140:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  141:     Form1 = {attribute,4,record,
  142:              {state,
  143:               [{typed_record_field,
  144:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  145:                 {type,5,map,
  146:                  [{type,5,map_field_exact,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  147:     Mapped1 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form1),
  148:     Form1 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped1),
  149:     Form2 = {attribute,4,record,
  150:              {state,
  151:               [{typed_record_field,
  152:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  153:                 {type,5,map,
  154:                  [{type,5,map_field_assoc,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  155:     Mapped2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form2),
  156:     Form2 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped2),
  157:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  158: 
  159: revert_preserve_pos_changes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  161:     Pos0 = 1,
  162:     Var0 = {var, Pos0, 'Var'},
  163:     %% Adding any user annotation makes erl_syntax change to it's internal
  164:     %% representation
  165:     Var1 = erl_syntax:add_ann({env, []}, Var0),
  166:     %% Change the `pos' of the node
  167:     Pos1 = erl_anno:set_generated(true, Pos0),
  168:     Var2 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Var1, Pos1),
  169:     %% The must be equal when reverted
  170:     {var, Pos1, 'Var'} = erl_syntax:revert(Var2),
  171:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  172: 
  173: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap each tree node with erl_syntax and check that
  174: %% erl_syntax:subtrees can access the wrapped node.
  175: wrapped_subtrees(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(2)),
  177:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(stdlib),"src","*.erl"]),
  178:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  179:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  180:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  181:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  182:     Map = fun (File) -> wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) end,
  183:     case p_run(Map, Fs) of
  184:         0 -> ok;
  185:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  186:     end,
  187:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  188: 
  189: wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) ->
  190:     case epp:parse_file(File, Path, []) of
  191:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  192:             lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Fs0)
  193:     end.
  194: 
  195: wrap_each(Tree) ->
  196:     % only `wrap` top-level erl_parse node
  197:     Tree1 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Tree, erl_syntax:get_pos(Tree)),
  198:     % assert ability to access subtrees of wrapped node with erl_syntax:subtrees/1
  199:     case erl_syntax:subtrees(Tree1) of
  200:         [] -> ok;
  201:         List ->
  202:             GrpsF = fun(Group) ->
  203:                           lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Group)
  204:                     end,
  205:             lists:foreach(GrpsF, List)
  206:     end.
  207: 
  208: %% api tests
  209: 
  210: t_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  211:     F0 = fun validate_basic_type/1,
  212:     Appl0 = fun(Name) ->
  213:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  214:                     erl_syntax:type_application(none, Atom, [])
  215:             end,
  216:     User0 = fun(Name) ->
  217:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  218:                     erl_syntax:user_type_application(Atom, [])
  219:             end,
  220:     ok = validate(F0,[{"tuple()", erl_syntax:tuple_type()}
  221:                      ,{"{}", erl_syntax:tuple_type([])}
  222:                      ,{"integer()", Appl0(integer)}
  223:                      ,{"foo()", User0(foo)}
  224:                      ,{"map()", erl_syntax:map_type()}
  225:                      ,{"#{}", erl_syntax:map_type([])}
  226:                      ,{"1..2", erl_syntax:integer_range_type
  227:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  228:                      ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", erl_syntax:bitstring_type
  229:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  230:                      ,{"fun()", erl_syntax:fun_type()}
  231:                      ]),
  232: 
  233:     F = fun validate_type/1,
  234:     ok = validate(F,[{"{}", tuple_type, false}
  235:                     ,{"tuple()", tuple_type, true}
  236:                     ,{"{atom()}", tuple_type, false}
  237:                     ,{"{atom(),integer()}", tuple_type, false}
  238:                     ,{"integer()", type_application, false}
  239:                     ,{"foo()", user_type_application, false}
  240:                     ,{"foo(integer())", user_type_application, false}
  241:                     ,{"module:function()", type_application, false}
  242:                     ,{"map()", map_type, true}
  243:                     ,{"#{}", map_type, false}
  244:                     ,{"#{atom() => integer()}", map_type, false}
  245:                     ,{"#{atom() := integer()}", map_type, false}
  246:                     ,{"#r{}", record_type, false}
  247:                     ,{"#r{a :: integer()}", record_type, false}
  248:                     ,{"[]", type_application, false}
  249:                     ,{"nil()", type_application, false}
  250:                     ,{"[atom()]", type_application, false}
  251:                     ,{"1..2", integer_range_type, false}
  252:                     ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", bitstring_type, false}
  253:                     ,{"fun()", fun_type, true}
  254:                     ,{"integer() | atom()", type_union, false}
  255:                     ,{"A :: fun()", annotated_type, false}
  256:                     ,{"fun((...) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  257:                     ,{"fun((integer()) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  258:                     ,{"V", variable, true}
  259:                     ]),
  260:     ok.
  261: 
  262: validate_basic_type({String, Tree}) ->
  263:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  264:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  265:     ok.
  266: 
  267: validate_type({String, Type, Leaf}) ->
  268:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  269:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  270:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  271:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  272:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  273:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  274:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  275:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  276:     ok.
  277: 
  278: t_abstract_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     F = fun validate_abstract_type/1,
  280:     ok = validate(F,[{hi,atom},
  281: 		     {1,integer},
  282: 		     {1.0,float},
  283: 		     {$a,integer},
  284: 		     {[],nil},
  285: 		     {[<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  286: 		     {[2,3,<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  287: 		     {[$a,$b,$c],string},
  288: 		     {"hello world",string},
  289: 		     {<<1,2,3>>,binary},
  290:                      {<<1,2,3:4>>,binary},
  291: 		     {#{a=>1,"b"=>2},map_expr},
  292: 		     {#{#{i=>1}=>1,"b"=>#{v=>2}},map_expr},
  293: 		     {{a,b,c},tuple}]),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: t_erl_parse_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  297:     F = fun validate_erl_parse_type/1,
  298:     %% leaf types
  299:     ok = validate(F,[{"1",integer,true},
  300: 		     {"123456789",integer,true},
  301: 		     {"$h", char,true},
  302: 		     {"3.1415", float,true},
  303: 		     {"1.33e36", float,true},
  304: 		     {"\"1.33e36: hello\"", string,true},
  305: 		     {"Var1", variable,true},
  306: 		     {"_", underscore,true},
  307: 		     {"[]", nil,true},
  308: 		     {"{}", tuple,true},
  309: 		     {"#{}",map_expr,true},
  310: 		     {"'some atom'", atom, true}]),
  311:     %% composite types
  312:     ok = validate(F,[{"case X of t -> t; f -> f end", case_expr,false},
  313: 		     {"try X of t -> t catch C:R -> error end", try_expr,false},
  314: 		     {"receive X -> X end", receive_expr,false},
  315: 		     {"receive M -> X1 after T -> X2 end", receive_expr,false},
  316: 		     {"catch (X)", catch_expr,false},
  317: 		     {"fun(X) -> X end", fun_expr,false},
  318: 		     {"fun Foo(X) -> X end", named_fun_expr,false},
  319: 		     {"fun foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  320: 		     {"fun bar:foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  321: 		     {"if X -> t; true -> f end", if_expr,false},
  322: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4>>", binary,false},
  323: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4:5>>", binary,false},
  324: 		     {"<<V1:63,V2:22/binary, V3/bits>>", binary,false},
  325: 		     {"begin X end", block_expr,false},
  326: 		     {"foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  327: 		     {"bar:foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  328: 		     {"[1,2,3,4]", list,false},
  329: 		     {"[1|4]", list, false},
  330: 		     {"[<<1>>,<<2>>,-2,<<>>,[more,list]]", list,false},
  331: 		     {"[1|[2|[3|[4|[]]]]]", list,false},
  332: 		     {"#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  333: 		     {"#{3=>3}#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  334: 		     {"#{ a:=1, b:=2 }", map_expr,false},
  335: 		     {"M#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  336: 		     {"[V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  337: 		     {"[V||V <:- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  338: 		     {"[catch V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  339: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  340: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <:= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  341: 		     {"<< (catch <<B>>) || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  342: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  343: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <:- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  344: 		     {"#{K => (catch V) || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  345:                      {"[V+W||V <- Vs && W <- Ws]", list_comp,false},
  346:                      {"[catch V+W||V <- Vs && W <- Ws]", list_comp,false},
  347:                      {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  348:                      {"<< (catch <<B>>) || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  349:                      {"<< <<B:8,C:8>> || <<B>> <= Bs && <<C>> <= Cs>>", binary_comp,false},
  350: 		     {"<< (catch <<B:8,C:8>>) || <<B>> <= Bs && <<C>> <= Cs>>", binary_comp,false},
  351: 		     {"#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  352: 		     {"#state{}", record_expr,false},
  353: 		     {"#s{ a = #def{ a=A }, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  354: 		     {"State#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  355: 		     {"State#state.a", record_access,false},
  356: 		     {"#state.a", record_index_expr,false},
  357: 		     {"-X", prefix_expr,false},
  358: 		     {"X1 + X2", infix_expr,false},
  359: 		     {"(X1 + X2) * X3", infix_expr,false},
  360: 		     {"X1 = X2", match_expr,false},
  361: 		     {"{a,b,c}", tuple,false}]),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: %% the macro ?MODULE seems faulty
  365: t_epp_dodger(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  366:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  367:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  368:     Filenames = test_files(),
  369:     ok = test_epp_dodger(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  370:     ok.
  371: 
  372: t_epp_dodger_clever(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  373:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  374:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  375:     Filenames = ["epp_dodger_clever.erl"],
  376:     ok = test_epp_dodger_clever(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  377:     ok.
  378: 
  379: t_comment_scan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  380:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  381:     Filenames = test_files(),
  382:     ok = test_comment_scan(Filenames,DataDir),
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: t_prettypr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  387:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  388:     Filenames = test_files(),
  389:     ok = test_prettypr(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  390:     ok.
  391: 
  392: %% Test bug (#4733) fix for annotating bindings for named fun expressions
  393: test_named_fun_bind_ann(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     Fn = {named_fun,{6,5},
  395:             'F',
  396:             [{clause,{6,9},
  397:                 [{var,{6,11},'Test'}],
  398:                 [],
  399:                 [{var,{7,13},'Test'}]}]},
  400:     AnnT = erl_syntax_lib:annotate_bindings(Fn, []),
  401:     [Env, Bound, Free] = erl_syntax:get_ann(AnnT),
  402:     {'env',[]} = Env,
  403:     {'bound',[]} = Bound,
  404:     {'free',[]} = Free,
  405: 
  406:     NameVar = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_name(AnnT),
  407:     Name = erl_syntax:variable_name(NameVar),
  408:     [NEnv, NBound, NFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(NameVar),
  409:     {'env',[]} = NEnv,
  410:     {'bound',[Name]} = NBound,
  411:     {'free',[]} = NFree,
  412: 
  413:     [Clause] = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_clauses(AnnT),
  414:     [CEnv, CBound, CFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(Clause),
  415:     {'env',[Name]} = CEnv,
  416:     {'bound',['Test']} = CBound,
  417:     {'free', []} = CFree.
  418: 
  419: %% Test annotation of maybe_expr, maybe_match_expr and else_expr (PR #8811)
  420: test_maybe_expr_ann(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  421:     %% maybe
  422:     %%  ok ?= Test,
  423:     %%  What ?= ok,
  424:     %%  Var = What,
  425:     %% else
  426:     %%  Error -> Error
  427:     %% end.
  428:     MaybeMatch1 = erl_syntax:maybe_match_expr(
  429:                     erl_syntax:atom(ok),
  430:                     erl_syntax:variable('Test')),
  431:     MaybeMatch2 = erl_syntax:maybe_match_expr(
  432:                     erl_syntax:variable('What'),
  433:                     erl_syntax:atom(ok)),
  434:     Match1 = erl_syntax:maybe_match_expr(
  435:                     erl_syntax:variable('Var'),
  436:                     erl_syntax:variable('What')),
  437:     Else = erl_syntax:else_expr(
  438:              [erl_syntax:clause(
  439:                 [erl_syntax:variable('Err')],
  440:                 'none',
  441:                [erl_syntax:variable('Err')])
  442:              ]),
  443:     Maybe = erl_syntax:maybe_expr([MaybeMatch1, MaybeMatch2, Match1], Else),
  444: 
  445:     MaybeAnn = erl_syntax_lib:annotate_bindings(Maybe, []),
  446:     [Env, Bound, Free] = erl_syntax:get_ann(MaybeAnn),
  447:     {'env',[]} = Env,
  448:     {'bound',[]} = Bound,
  449:     {'free',['Test']} = Free,
  450: 
  451:     [MaybeMatchAnn1, MaybeMatchAnn2, MatchAnn1] = erl_syntax:maybe_expr_body(MaybeAnn),
  452:     [Env1, Bound1, Free1] = erl_syntax:get_ann(MaybeMatchAnn1),
  453:     {'env',[]} = Env1,
  454:     {'bound',[]} = Bound1,
  455:     {'free',['Test']} = Free1,
  456:     [Env2, Bound2, Free2] = erl_syntax:get_ann(MaybeMatchAnn2),
  457:     {'env',[]} = Env2,
  458:     {'bound',['What']} = Bound2,
  459:     {'free',[]} = Free2,
  460:     [Env3, Bound3, Free3] = erl_syntax:get_ann(MatchAnn1),
  461:     {'env',['What']} = Env3,
  462:     {'bound',['Var']} = Bound3,
  463:     {'free',['What']} = Free3,
  464: 
  465:     ElseAnn = erl_syntax:maybe_expr_else(MaybeAnn),
  466:     [Env4, Bound4, Free4] = erl_syntax:get_ann(ElseAnn),
  467:     {'env',[]} = Env4,
  468:     {'bound',[]} = Bound4,
  469:     {'free',[]} = Free4.
  470: 
  471: test_files(Config) ->
  472:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  473:     [ filename:join(DataDir,Filename) || Filename <- test_files() ].
  474: 
  475: test_files() ->
  476:     ["syntax_tools_SUITE_test_module.erl",
  477:      "syntax_tools_test.erl",
  478:      "type_specs.erl",
  479:      "specs_and_funs.erl"].
  480: 
  481: test_comment_scan([],_) -> ok;
  482: test_comment_scan([File|Files],DataDir) ->
  483:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  484:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, [], []),
  485:     Comments  = erl_comment_scan:file(Filename),
  486:     Fun = fun(Node) ->
  487: 		  case erl_syntax:is_form(Node) of
  488: 		      true ->
  489: 			  C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,[" This is a form."]),
  490: 			  Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  491: 			  Node1;
  492: 		      false ->
  493: 			  Node
  494: 		  end
  495: 	  end,
  496:     Fs1 = erl_recomment:recomment_forms(Fs0, Comments),
  497:     Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(Fun, Fs1),
  498:     io:format("File: ~ts~n", [Filename]),
  499:     io:put_chars(erl_prettypr:format(Fs2, [{paper,  120},
  500: 					   {ribbon, 110}])),
  501:     test_comment_scan(Files,DataDir).
  502: 
  503: 
  504: test_prettypr([],_,_) -> ok;
  505: test_prettypr([File|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  506:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  507:     Options = [res_word_option()],
  508:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  509:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, Options),
  510:     Fs = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  511:     PP = erl_prettypr:format(Fs, [{paper,  120}, {ribbon, 110}]),
  512:     io:put_chars(PP),
  513:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, File),
  514:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  515:     io:format("Parsing OutFile: ~ts~n", [OutFile]),
  516:     {ok, Fs2} = epp:parse_file(OutFile, Options),
  517:     case [Error || {error, _} = Error <- Fs2] of
  518:         [] ->
  519:             ok;
  520:         Errors ->
  521:             ct:fail(Errors)
  522:     end,
  523:     test_prettypr(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  524: 
  525: test_epp_dodger([], _, _) -> ok;
  526: test_epp_dodger([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  527:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  528:     Options  = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  529:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  530:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:parse_file(File, Options) end,parse_file},
  531: 		{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File,
  532:                                                           Options) end,quick_parse_file},
  533: 		{fun (File) ->
  534: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  535: 			Res = epp_dodger:parse(Dev, Options),
  536: 			file:close(File),
  537: 			Res
  538: 		 end, parse},
  539: 		{fun (File) ->
  540: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  541: 			Res = epp_dodger:quick_parse(Dev, Options),
  542: 			file:close(File),
  543: 			Res
  544: 		 end, quick_parse}],
  545:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  546:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  547:     test_epp_dodger(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  548: 
  549: test_epp_dodger_clever([], _, _) -> ok;
  550: test_epp_dodger_clever([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  551:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  552:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  553:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) ->
  554:                          epp_dodger:parse_file(File, [clever])
  555:                  end, parse_file},
  556: 		{fun(File) ->
  557:                          epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File, [clever])
  558:                  end, quick_parse_file}],
  559:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  560:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  561:     test_epp_dodger_clever(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  562: 
  563: parse_with([],_) -> [];
  564: parse_with([{Fun,ParserType}|Funs],File) ->
  565:     {ok, Fs} = Fun(File),
  566:     ErrorMarkers = [begin
  567:                         print_error_markers(F, File),
  568:                         F
  569:                     end
  570:                     || F <- Fs,
  571:                        erl_syntax:type(F) =:= error_marker],
  572:     [] = ErrorMarkers,
  573:     [{Fs,ParserType}|parse_with(Funs,File)].
  574: 
  575: pretty_print_parse_forms([],_,_) -> ok;
  576: pretty_print_parse_forms([{Fs0,Type}|FsForms],PrivDir,Filename) ->
  577:     Parser  = atom_to_list(Type),
  578:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, Parser ++"_" ++ Filename),
  579:     io:format("Pretty print ~p (~w) to ~p~n", [Filename,Type,OutFile]),
  580:     Comment = fun (Node,{CntCase,CntTry}=Cnt) ->
  581: 		      case erl_syntax:type(Node) of
  582: 			  case_expr ->
  583: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a case expression"]),
  584: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  585: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a case expression"]),
  586: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:add_postcomments([C2],Node1),
  587: 			      {Node2,{CntCase+1,CntTry}};
  588: 			  try_expr ->
  589: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a try expression"]),
  590: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:set_precomments(Node,
  591: 						     erl_syntax:get_precomments(Node) ++ [C1]),
  592: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a try expression"]),
  593: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:set_postcomments(Node1,
  594: 						     erl_syntax:get_postcomments(Node1) ++ [C2]),
  595: 			      {Node2,{CntCase,CntTry+1}};
  596: 			  _ ->
  597: 			      {Node,Cnt}
  598: 		      end
  599: 	      end,
  600:     Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  601:     {Fs2,{CC,CT}} = erl_syntax_lib:mapfold(Comment,{0,0}, Fs1),
  602:     io:format("Commented on ~w cases and ~w tries~n", [CC,CT]),
  603:     PP  = erl_prettypr:format(Fs2),
  604:     ok  = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  605:     pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename).
  606: 
  607: 
  608: validate(_,[]) -> ok;
  609: validate(F,[V|Vs]) ->
  610:     ok = F(V),
  611:     validate(F,Vs).
  612: 
  613: 
  614: validate_abstract_type({Lit,Type}) ->
  615:     Tree = erl_syntax:abstract(Lit),
  616:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  617:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  618:     true = erl_syntax:is_literal(Tree),
  619:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  620:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  621:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  622:     Conc = erl_syntax:concrete(Tree),
  623:     Lit  = Conc,
  624:     ok.
  625: 
  626: validate_erl_parse_type({String,Type,Leaf}) ->
  627:     ErlT = string_to_expr(String),
  628:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  629:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  630:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  631:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  632:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  633:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  634:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  635:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  636:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,RevT),
  637:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  638:     ok.
  639: 
  640: validate_special_type(string,Node) ->
  641:     Val  = erl_syntax:string_value(Node),
  642:     true = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,Val),
  643:     _    = erl_syntax:string_literal(Node),
  644:     ok;
  645: validate_special_type(variable,Node) ->
  646:     _ = erl_syntax:variable_literal(Node),
  647:     ok;
  648: validate_special_type(fun_expr,Node) ->
  649:     A = erl_syntax:fun_expr_arity(Node),
  650:     true = is_integer(A),
  651:     ok;
  652: validate_special_type(named_fun_expr,Node) ->
  653:     A = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_arity(Node),
  654:     true = is_integer(A),
  655:     ok;
  656: validate_special_type(tuple,Node) ->
  657:     Size = erl_syntax:tuple_size(Node),
  658:     true = is_integer(Size),
  659:     ok;
  660: validate_special_type(float,Node) ->
  661:     Str   = erl_syntax:float_literal(Node),
  662:     Val   = list_to_float(Str),
  663:     Val   = erl_syntax:float_value(Node),
  664:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  665:     false = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  666:     ok;
  667: validate_special_type(integer,Node) ->
  668:     Str   = erl_syntax:integer_literal(Node),
  669:     Val   = list_to_integer(Str),
  670:     true  = erl_syntax:is_integer(Node,Val),
  671:     Val   = erl_syntax:integer_value(Node),
  672:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  673:     ok;
  674: validate_special_type(nil,Node) ->
  675:     true  = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  676:     ok;
  677: validate_special_type(list,Node) ->
  678:     true  = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  679:     _     = erl_syntax:list_tail(Node),
  680:     ErrV  = erl_syntax:list_head(Node),
  681:     false = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,ErrV),
  682:     Norm  = erl_syntax:normalize_list(Node),
  683:     list  = erl_syntax:type(Norm),
  684:     case erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node) of
  685: 	true ->
  686: 	    true = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  687: 	    Compact = erl_syntax:compact_list(Node),
  688: 	    list = erl_syntax:type(Compact),
  689: 	    [_|_] = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  690: 	    _  = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  691: 	    N  = erl_syntax:list_length(Node),
  692: 	    true = N > 0,
  693: 	    ok;
  694: 	false ->
  695: 	    ok
  696:     end;
  697: validate_special_type(_,_) ->
  698:     ok.
  699: 
  700: %%% scan_and_parse
  701: 
  702: string_to_expr(String) ->
  703:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  704:     {ok, Ts, _} = erl_scan:string(String++"."),
  705:     {ok,[Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Ts),
  706:     Expr.
  707: 
  708: string_to_type(String) ->
  709:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  710:     {ok,Ts,_} = erl_scan:string("-type foo() :: "++String++".", 0),
  711:     {ok,Form} = erl_parse:parse_form(Ts),
  712:     {attribute,_,type,{foo,Type,_NoParms=[]}} = Form,
  713:     Type.
  714: 
  715: 
  716: p_run(Test, List) ->
  717:     N = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
  718:     p_run_loop(Test, List, N, [], 0).
  719: 
  720: p_run_loop(_, [], _, [], Errors) ->
  721:     Errors;
  722: p_run_loop(Test, [H|T], N, Refs, Errors) when length(Refs) < N ->
  723:     {_,Ref} = erlang:spawn_monitor(fun() -> exit(Test(H)) end),
  724:     p_run_loop(Test, T, N, [Ref|Refs], Errors);
  725: p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs0, Errors0) ->
  726:     receive
  727: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Res} ->
  728: 	    Errors = case Res of
  729: 			 ok -> Errors0;
  730: 			 error -> Errors0+1
  731: 		     end,
  732: 	    Refs = Refs0 -- [Ref],
  733: 	    p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs, Errors)
  734:     end.
  735: 
  736: res_word_option() ->
  737:     Options = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  738:     {ok, {_Ftrs, ResWordFun}} =
  739:         erl_features:keyword_fun(Options, fun erl_scan:f_reserved_word/1),
  740:     {reserved_word_fun, ResWordFun}.
